concept: Simple classes, fields, constructors, and basic methods.

challenges.title: Point Distance (Class)
challenges.description: Create a class Point with fields x and y (ints). Read coordinates of two points and print the Manhattan distance |x1 - x2| + |y1 - y2|.
challenges.inputDescription: Four integers x1 y1 x2 y2.

challenges.title: Rectangle Class Area
challenges.description: Create a Rectangle class with width and height. Read w and h, create a Rectangle object and print its area.

challenges.title: Student Average Marks
challenges.description: Create a Student class with name and three subject marks. Read name and three marks, compute average (integer division) and print: <name> <avg>.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: name (no spaces). Second line: three integers m1 m2 m3.

challenges.title: Bank Account Deposit
challenges.description: Create a BankAccount class with fields accountNumber and balance. Read accountNumber and initial balance, then an amount to deposit. After deposit print the final balance.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: accountNumber (int). Second line: initial balance (int). Third line: deposit amount (int).

challenges.title: Circle Class
challenges.description: Create a Circle class with radius field. Read radius r, create Circle and print area using 3.14 * r * r as double with two decimal places.
challenges.outputDescription: Double with two decimal places: area.

challenges.title: Complex Number Addition
challenges.description: Create a Complex class with real and imaginary parts (ints). Read two complex numbers a and b, print their sum in format: real imag.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: aReal aImag. Second line: bReal bImag.

challenges.title: Employee Salary Hike
challenges.description: Create an Employee class with name and salary. Read name and salary, then a hike percentage p (int). Increase salary by p% and print final salary as integer (floor).
challenges.inputDescription: First line: name (no spaces). Second line: salary (int). Third line: p (int).

challenges.title: Book Discount
challenges.description: Create a Book class with title and price. Read title (no spaces) and price. Then read discount percentage d, and print final price after discount, as integer.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: title. Second line: price (int). Third line: d (int).

challenges.title: Time to Seconds (Class)
challenges.description: Create a Time class with fields hours, minutes, seconds. Read h m s and convert entire time to total seconds and print.

challenges.title: Distance Between Points (Double)
challenges.description: Using Point class with double x and y, read two points and print Euclidean distance between them with two decimal places.
challenges.inputDescription: Four doubles x1 y1 x2 y2.
